post.body: The artist, Paul Gauguin.
Add $20/week to the asking price and you'll get the place. </savage Sydney rental market experience>
One naive slogan: Live free or die.
It would appear you have a lot of spare crumbs too :) Now you are part of the Circle of Life.
What brand is it? I have always suspected the Sony VAIO is powered by ants.
With BSG, don't forget to watch the between-season shows, Razor (season 3.5) and the webisodes (season 4.5) :)

If you'd like a lift, be outside my apartment building at 6.15pm. Call me if you forget my address.
Yo! A few of us are driving to the TED Talk from Randwick. Want a lift? Call me on 0415 747 386.
The early 21st Century: where every hero is morally ambiguous.
Watching 'Hitman' at @sineltor's house.
"The point, as Marx saw it, is that dreams never come true." -- Hannah Arendt
"Life being what it is, we all dream of revenge." -- Kaki King.
"Life isn't one thing after another. It's the same damn thing, over and over." Edna St Vincent Millay.
I'm being interviewed at 2pm today. Studiously working out what to say.
Thinking about James III. It is 2008. The photograph is in my hand.
"My policy on ass-kicking: if you ask for it, then I have to let you have it." - Taylor Mali.
"He said no, but he says a lot of things." TED Talks #14 is going well.
See you at TED Talks tonight, @sineltor, @faldo, @aimee_maree, @mr_internets and @ryancross.
TweetDeck is great, but wow, it eats a lot of memory.
